description: The construction of a part 9, part 10 storey building on the site of 52-54 Thurston Road SE13, to provide 308 sq.m of commercial space (Use Class B1 Business) on the ground floor and 28x1 bed,24x2 bed and 10x3 bed self-contained flats, together with the provision of five car parking spaces, 66 cycle spaces, bin store and associated landscaping.
